get.description: This API fetches a single Module

get.summary: Get Modules Accessible To Current User Profile
get.description: The API fetches a list of modules that are accessible to the current user profile.

The API fetches all the modules available in Zoho Desk.

This API is deprecated, use api/v1/organizationModules api for fetching modules.
The API fetches all the modules.

parameters.name: moduleAPIname
parameters.description: Module apiName. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas in the API request

schema.description: Module apiName. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas in the API request

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Module apiName. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas in the API request

post.description: The API creates a Custom Module. Custom Module allows users to organize, store, and manage specific types of data tailored to meet unique business requirements.

get.description: This API fetches the number of records.

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: ID of the view from which the record count needs to be fetched.

schema.description: ID of the view from which the record count needs to be fetched.
